content: ज्या I. {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (जिनाति) {@--1@} To overpower, oppress. {@--2@} To grow old. {@--3@} A. (जीयते) To be oppressed.

ज्या {@--1@} A bow-string; विश्रामं लभतामिदं च शिथिलज्याबंधमस्मद्धनुः <ls>Ś. 2. 6</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 59</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 15</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 104.</ls> {@--2@} The chord of an arc. {@--3@} The earth. {@--4@} A mother. {@--5@} Overpowering force or strength. {@--6@} Excessive demand, importunity.
